summary: This function searches for a constructor.
formals: are the types of the constructor's formal parameters.
returns: Return an object that represents the constructor, if the constructor exists; otherwise, return null.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val ctor = F::findConstructor(class LinkedList, [class Collection]);%0A%0A    F::println(ctor);%0A}
